languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies.
languages.original_text: В начале боя {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} получает дополнительные уровни Тактического преимущества по числу противников.

traits.locale_text: The Tactician begins combat with additional stacks of Tactical Advantage equal to the number of enemies.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастер-тактик{/g} получает дополнительные уровни {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактического преимущества{/g} по числу противников.
В начале боя тактик получает дополнительные уровни Тактического преимущества по числу противников.

languages.text: 战斗开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}额外获得{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，等同于敌人数量。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，战术专家获得等同于敌人数量的战术优势层数。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones adicionales de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} como el número de enemigos.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} empieza el combate con tantas acumulaciones adicionales de Ventaja táctica como el número de enemigos.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} beginnt den Kampf mit zusätzlichen Stapeln von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer Vorteil{/g}, und zwar entsprechend der Anzahl von Feinden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} beginnt den Kampf mit zusätzlichen Stapeln von Taktischer Vorteil, und zwar entsprechend der Anzahl von Feinden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g} commence le combat avec un nombre de cumuls supplémentaires d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} égal au nombre d'ennemis.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies.

traits.locale_text: Le Tacticien commence le combat avec un nombre supplémentaire de cumuls d'Avantage Tactique égal au nombre d'ennemis.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は、敵の数に等しい戦術的優位のスタックを追加で所持して戦闘を開始する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of tactical advantage equal to the number of enemies.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は、敵の数に等しい戦術的優位のスタックを追加で所持して戦闘を開始する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g} çatışmaya düşman sayısına eşit miktarda ilave {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimiyle başlar.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} begins combat with additional stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies.
